title: Font Change - Regular vs Troubleshooting Mode

It doesn't occur in troubleshooting mode as shown in the attached picture. Any help to resolve this would be greatly appreciated!
creator: sdhillon

title: Two Factor Authentication Using  Twilio Authy
content: Frustrating experience trying to use Twilio Authy. Whenever I first installed it on my iPhone I was using Password1 and that is the only record it shows, with no obvious way to delete that entry now that I have dumped Password1 in favor of Bitwarden. Plus when trying to install on Linux Mint desktop it first wanted me to use Snap package but Mint uses Flatpak. Got it installed using default software manager in Mint, then when I wanted to authenticate it sent code to phone, but phone said already registered so no way to authenticate desktop version. Forget it ... I use my Yubikey for all my other 2FA and it works slicker-n-snot this Twilio thing is too much hassle comparatively. When Mozilla adds some other 2FA choices THEN I can use 2FA with FF, not this app. Ugh.
creator: w7dah1

title: Used Cryptotechnologies in Firefox
content:
Hello,

for a business project i need the following information about the usage of cryptotechnology within Firefox:

- which cryptotechnologies are used in Firefox? - what functions are the cryptotechnologies used for? - which algorythms are used? - what are the algorythms used for in the product? - the mode of the algorythms (e.g. OAEP, PSS, CBC, GCM)? - which of the algorythms are actively used? - which secure protocols are used?

Thank you very much in advance for your help.

Best Regards

Bjoern

title: Como faço para remover os e-mails que aparecem no campo "e-mail" para fazer login em sites?
content:
Oi, boa noite. Tudo bem?

Preciso de ajuda para remover e-mails que ficaram salvos na minha conta, veja, eu não tenho contas salvas no serviço de gerenciamento de senhas no Firefox, mas sim aqueles e-mails que aparecem ao clicar num campo de e-mail para logar em sites.

Já desmarquei todas as configurações do navegador na aba "Contas e senhas" dentro do menu de "Privacidade e Segurança" e mesmo assim esses e-mails continuam aparecendo.

Preciso removê-los pois acidentalmente preenchi um dado sensível nesse campo e agora ela aparece toda vez que clico em um campo de e-mail.

Nas imagens em anexo deixei o exemplo de campo de e-mail que me refiro e também as atuais configurações do navegador em "contas e senhas".

Desde já agradeço pela ajuda, uma ótima semana!

Atenciosamente
creator: claaytonfernandes
